      • executeStep

        public void executeStep(int numThreads,
                        int chunkSize,
                        int timeIntervalMinutes)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute the HTTP requests, gather and publish the statistics. A concrete test may have multiple calls to ramp up, steady level and ramp down.
        Parameters:
        numThreads - number of Akka threads
        chunkSize - number of bundled requests
        timeIntervalMinutes - time to run requests
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when HTTP request generation fails
